legal_basis: Section 13 of the Consolidation of Holdings Ordinance, 1960

key_points.grievance: Petitioner claims inferior land allocation and incomplete entitlement.
key_points.shortage: 5 kanals-17 marlas (in terms of Class I)
key_points.remand_order: Case remanded to A.C.O. for separation of Khia's share and adjustment of shortage.
key_points.request_rejected: Petitioner's request to not separate Khia's share was rejected.

modification: Shortage of 3 kanals-17 marlas in Scheme No. 474 to be adjusted from respondents with excess Class I land.
remarks: Keeping joint khata may lead to friction and litigation between co-sharers.
